author: Jacob Dressler
description:
We’re finally nearing the start of production for the long-awaited sequel The Batman: Part II. Robert Pattinson is set to reprise his role as Bruce Wayne aka Batman for the follow-up. However, it looks like he’ll be joined by some new faces, and quite possibly one Marvel star that’ll be making the move to DC [...]

The post Marvel Star In Talks To Join ‘The Batman: Part II’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Marvel Star In Talks To Join ‘The Batman: Part II’

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Paranormal Activity movie franchise is making a comeback – with horror filmmaker James Wan set to produce the latest installment. The series will be returning for its eighth entry following the release of 2021’s Paranormal Activity: Next of Kin. The 2021 entry was considered a failure by fans and critics – even by Blumhouse‘s [...]

The post James Wan To Produce ‘Paranormal Activity 8’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: James Wan To Produce ‘Paranormal Activity 8’

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The new movie Predator: Badlands has once again merged the Alien and Predator franchises – albeit without the Xenomorphs. The critically-acclaimed sequel pairs up the titular alien, otherwise known as a Yautja, with a Weyland-Yutani synthetic android. The interesting world-building behind the story there is something that has fans wondering if a new Alien vs. [...]

The post ‘Predator: Badlands’ Director Hints At New ‘Alien Vs. Predator’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Predator: Badlands’ Director Hints At New ‘Alien Vs. Predator’

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Fans naturally suspected that 2019’s Ready or Not was destined to be a stand-alone story. However, all of that changed when plans for a sequel were announced, shocking fans who thought the original tale was done. Now fans can see the Ready or Not 2: Here I Come trailer and see just how much story [...]

The post ‘Ready Or Not 2: Here I Come’ Official Trailer Released appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Ready Or Not 2: Here I Come’ Official Trailer Released
